question: What is a Put option?
option1: It has an obligation to buy
option2: It have an obligation to sell
option3: Owner has the right to sell but not obligation to sell
answer: Owner has the right to sell but not obligation to sell
explanation: Options are the class of futures where the buyer or seller has the option of whether to buy or not. The put option is where Owner has the right to sell but not obligation to sell.
